mapper.select: SELECT EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.OFF_YN AS offYn /* 오프라인 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.EZWEL_ORDER_NUM AS ezwelOrderNum /* 이지웰 주문 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_ORDER_NUM AS partnerOrderNum /* 제휴사 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_RESERV_NUM AS faclReservNum /* 시설 예약 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.DEVICE_DIV AS deviceDiv /* 디바이스 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_KEY AS userKey /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_NM AS faclNm /* 시설 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_SALE_AMT AS totSaleAmt /* 총 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_IN_DD AS checkInDd /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_OUT_DD AS checkOutDd /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_ADT_CNT AS totAdtCnt /* 총 성인 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_CHILD_CNT AS totChildCnt /* 총 소아 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_NM AS guestNm /* 투숙자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_MOBILE AS guestMobile /* 투숙자 휴대전화, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_EMAIL AS guestEmail /* 투숙자 이메일, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_SEND_DT AS reservFaxSendDt /* 예약 팩스 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_RECV_DT AS reservFaxRecvDt /* 예약 팩스 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_DT AS reservDt /* 예약 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_CANCEL_DT AS reservCancelDt /* 예약 취소 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_STATUS AS reservStatus /* 예약 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.OFF_YN AS offYn /* 오프라인 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.EZWEL_ORDER_NUM AS ezwelOrderNum /* 이지웰 주문 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_ORDER_NUM AS partnerOrderNum /* 제휴사 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_RESERV_NUM AS faclReservNum /* 시설 예약 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.DEVICE_DIV AS deviceDiv /* 디바이스 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_KEY AS userKey /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_NM AS faclNm /* 시설 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_SALE_AMT AS totSaleAmt /* 총 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_IN_DD AS checkInDd /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHECK_OUT_DD AS checkOutDd /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_ADT_CNT AS totAdtCnt /* 총 성인 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.TOT_CHILD_CNT AS totChildCnt /* 총 소아 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_NM AS guestNm /* 투숙자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_MOBILE AS guestMobile /* 투숙자 휴대전화, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.GUEST_EMAIL AS guestEmail /* 투숙자 이메일, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_SEND_DT AS reservFaxSendDt /* 예약 팩스 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_FAX_RECV_DT AS reservFaxRecvDt /* 예약 팩스 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_DT AS reservDt /* 예약 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_CANCEL_DT AS reservCancelDt /* 예약 취소 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_STATUS AS reservStatus /* 예약 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM = #{param.reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = #{param.faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = #{param.partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = #{param.channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.USER_ID = #{param.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
ORDER BY EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_RESERV_BASE SET /* 예약 기본 정보 */ OFF_YN = #{offYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 오프라인 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZWEL_ORDER_NUM = #{ezwelOrderNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 이지웰 주문 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,PARTNER_ORDER_NUM = #{partnerOrderNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,FACL_RESERV_NUM = #{faclReservNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 예약 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,DEVICE_DIV = #{deviceDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 디바이스 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,USER_KEY = #{userKey, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* USER_KEY, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,FACL_NM = #{faclNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,TOT_SALE_AMT = #{totSaleAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 총 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,TOT_ADT_CNT = #{totAdtCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 총 성인 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,TOT_CHILD_CNT = #{totChildCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 총 소아 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,GUEST_NM = #{guestNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 투숙자 명, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,GUEST_MOBILE = #{guestMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 투숙자 휴대전화, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,GUEST_EMAIL = #{guestEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 투숙자 이메일, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,RESERV_FAX_SEND_DT = #{reservFaxSendDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 팩스 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,RESERV_FAX_RECV_DT = #{reservFaxRecvDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 팩스 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,RESERV_DT = #{reservDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,RESERV_CANCEL_DT = #{reservCancelDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 취소 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,RESERV_STATUS = #{reservStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ WHERE 1=1 AND RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
